English: to walk in a cirle path
talking to someone on the phone
a unit for counting small items like seeds
i am carrying on my back
the place where it was given
you are the one who is blaming.

Iloko: iyebkas ti daniw nga adda aksionna

English: i humbly ask for your kindness.
you move out of the way!

Iloko: surat no kayat mo ti agpakada
